tasks.title: Setup Express.js Application Foundation
tasks.body: Create the basic Node.js/Express.js application structure with MVC architecture. Initialize the project with package.json, set up Express server, create folder structure (models, views, controllers, routes), implement basic middleware for JSON parsing and static files, and create a simple health check endpoint. Set up basic error handling and logging.

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication System
tasks.body: Build user registration and login functionality. Create User model with password hashing using bcrypt, implement registration endpoint with input validation, create login endpoint with JWT token generation, set up authentication middleware for protected routes, and create basic HTML forms for registration and login with proper error handling and success messages.

tasks.title: Build User Profile CRUD Operations
tasks.body: Implement complete user profile management system. Create profile model with fields for user information (name, email, bio, etc.), implement GET, POST, PUT, DELETE endpoints for profile operations, add profile update forms with validation, ensure users can only access/modify their own profiles, and implement proper error handling for all CRUD operations.

tasks.title: Create User Dashboard Interface
tasks.body: Build a comprehensive dashboard that displays user information and integrates all previous functionality. Create dashboard route with authentication protection, design dashboard HTML template showing user profile information, implement navigation between dashboard, profile editing, and logout functionality, add basic CSS styling for a clean interface, and ensure all features work together seamlessly with proper error handling and user feedback.
